sentences.en: It is malleability that allows metal to deform permanently under compression without rupture.
sentences.cn: 正是展性使金属在压力下永久变形而不断裂.

sentences.en: It provides an environment of incomparable textual malleability and further fulfills many reconstructive hypotheses about text.
sentences.cn: 它提供文本文字无比的可塑性,更具体实现了解构理论对“文本”的各种假设.

sentences.en: Tests used to assess the ductility and malleability of stainless steel subjected to bending.
sentences.cn: 测试不锈钢在弯曲状态下的延展性及可锻性.

sentences.en: Two mechanisms allow for such self - concept maintenance: inattention to moral standards and categorization malleability.
sentences.cn: 两种方法可以获得这样的 自我 概念维持: 忽视道德保准和延展分类.

words.tran_cn: 可锻的；可塑的；有延展性的；易适应的
